name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
otherNightReminder: If the Banshee was killed by the Demon tonight, announce to all players that the Banshee has died.

jinxes.reason: If the Vortox kills the Banshee, all players learn that the Banshee has died.
Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.
Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.
